name: Dice&Slash
description:
Platform adventure game. Roll the dice for modifiers. But be aware the if run out of gold you loose.

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice

Controls:

A and D to move sideways

SPACE bar to jump

K to attack or advance in menus

Mouse left button to attack

Dice Effects:

Increase Player's attack power

Increase Player's moving speed

Increase Player's jumping height

Increase the amount health each coin gives

Add a 10% chance to avoid loosing a coin when get hit

Increase enemies attack power

Increase enemies health

Increase time between player's attacks

Asset packs used:

2D graphics by https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Font by https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold

Musics by https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

Game created by Eduardo Delagnelo Barbetta and Nikolas Benetti de Paula Timmermann
